Maxwell to Rohit Sharma, no run fired quicker and flatter, angled across and beats the bat as he tries to dab it to third man
Maxwell to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs 97kph, high full toss, just below waist high, he swings hard, gets an outside edge and it runs fine to third man for four!
Lyon to Jadeja, no run drifting into leg, he gets an inside edge onto pad
Lyon to Jadeja, 1 run shorter length, hint of spin, he gives room and cuts hard to deep point
Lyon to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs he stands still, it's in the arc, and he launches it over long on and into the crowd! Great strike!

Lyon to Jadeja, no run slightly shorter, 94kph, he's back and cutting a ball, not that short, straight to point

Stoinis to Jadeja, no run 128kph, bouncer, followed him as he backed away, he tried to pull but missed it

Stoinis to Rohit Sharma, no run short and wide, he tries to cut but misses this one

Stoinis to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs nailed it into the second tier of the Member's stand at deep midwicket! Full in the slot on middle and that swing of the bat was pure! Out of the screws it sailed way back!

Stoinis to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs length ball, outside off, he swipes this hard and flat into the gap at midwicket at it beats the sweeper running around! The power of Rohit is stunning! He does it so easily

Jhye Richardson to Jadeja, OUT caught at deep backward point! He bowled a quick short ball, Jadeja backs away and upper cuts, he flushes it but gets it too square, it goes all the way to Marsh on the rope, he settles and takes the catch! Four for Richardson
Jhye Richardson to Rohit Sharma, 1 run 112kph, slower ball, short outside off, he cuts to deep point along the ground

Jhye Richardson to Bhuvneshwar, no run 105kph, leg cutter slower ball, completely fools him outside off, he swings way too early and misses. It was out of the back of the hand
Jhye Richardson to Bhuvneshwar, no run 135kph, bouncer, he backs away, to upper cut but it follows him and he misses
Stoinis to Rohit Sharma, 1 run 126kph, full toss, just below waist high, wide of off, he miscues a baseball style swing, out to wide long on

Stoinis to Rohit Sharma, 1 wide 126kph slower ball, gets it wrong, sprays way wide of off and called a wide
Stoinis to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs 125kph, full toss outside off, he swings hard, miscues off the toe but he gets enough of it to just float over the head of mid off and away to the rope!

Stoinis to Rohit Sharma, OUT caught at deep midwicket! Rohit's brave lone hand comes to an end. Slower ball banged in back of a length, he tries to heave this again over midwicket for six, miscues, gets a thick top edge, Maxwell is down at deep midwicket, he runs in and pouches

Stoinis to Bhuvneshwar, 2 runs dropped by Khawaja at long on! Slower ball, into the wicket, he swings this high towards long on, Khawaja runs in and slides and puts it down! He was late to get to it. Might have misjudged it
Stoinis to Bhuvneshwar, no run slower ball outside off, he steps way across outside off trying to swing it to fine leg but misses
Jhye Richardson to Kuldeep, 1 run full angled into leg stump, he clips this away very neatly off his pads behind square to the sweeper
Jhye Richardson to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run 109kph, slower ball, back of a length, he backs away and miscues slapping this off the toe end of the bat towards long on
Jhye Richardson to Kuldeep, no run 106kph, slower ball, back of a length, it comes off the thigh pad and rolls to the keeper

Jhye Richardson to Bhuvneshwar, no run 136kph, yorker speared into the feet as he backs away, it comes off the boot
Jhye Richardson to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run yorker, 133kph, fired into leg stump, he squeezes this out behind square
Stoinis to Bhuvneshwar, FOUR runs 128kph, short ball, he skips down and backs away, and upper cuts this over short third man and away to the rope!
Stoinis to Bhuvneshwar, FOUR runs 127kph, back of a length, he backs away and carves this away behind point and Marsh can't cut it off!
Stoinis to Bhuvneshwar, no run slower ball, outside off, he steps way outside off, to paddle scoop it fine but misses

Stoinis to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run almost a screamer at short fine from Behrendorff! Slower ball bouncer, he pulled it in the air, to the left of short fine, Behrendorff, flies full stretch to his left and just gets a hand to it but can't hold on
Stoinis to Kuldeep, 1 leg bye slower ball, he steps outside off, it comes off thigh pad

Stoinis to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run dropped by Khawaja at long on! This was in the slot, he got under it hitting it miles in the air to long on, but not long enough, Khawaja, waits under it, waits and waits, and drops it
Siddle to Bhuvneshwar, FOUR runs shorter outside off, he cuts hard up and over point for four!
Siddle to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run 115kph, slower ball on middle, he skips out and drives wide of cover
Siddle to Kuldeep, 1 run 115kph, short slower ball, he mis-times a pull through forward square

Siddle to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run 133kph, full toss speared into leg, he clips this away through midwicket

Siddle to Kuldeep, OUT caught at deep backward square! Khawaja holds one! Slower ball, shorter, he steps outside off and pulls this in the air to deep backward square, Khawaja waits again, but he clings onto this one and Siddle has a wicket!
Stoinis to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run 107kph, slower ball outside off, he slices this high in the air, to point and it lands safe between three men! Stoinis can't believe it

Stoinis to Bhuvneshwar, FOUR runs slower ball, he picks it and plays a magnificent cover drive, inside out, lacing it to the rope!

Australia win by 34 runs. An upset to start the series. Australia defend 288 despite a magnificent century from Rohit Sharma. India were 3 for 4 early, Behrendorff and Richardson striking upfront. Richardson removed Kohli and Rayudu. Rohit and Dhoni rebuilt. But Dhoni was unfortunate

Australia go 1-0 up in the three match series. The next game is in Adelaide on Tuesday. On behalf of all the team thanks for your company tonight. Look out for Andrew McGlashan's post-game coverage from the SCG. For now goodbye, and hopefully we see you Tuesday.
